title: How Do I Play League on a Mac in Canada
body:
Hey, guys I know you probably think I'm an idiot for buying a MacBook (I am) but I want to play League and I can't do it on this stupid operating system without the inside of my computer heating up to 75 Celcius and crashing the game. I've done loads of research and tried things like PlayOnMac and the WindowsOS (free) but neither of them works for me. Also if you Google "How to play League on a Mac in Canada" the first thing that comes up is some Apple article talking about how it's only possible to run League on US ports but I don't think that's true because I can run the client perfectly fine it's just when I get into a match of any kind that the performance goes down immensely. 

Does anyone know of any programs I could use to make League run smoother and actually work?

I've tried doing things to make it better but it just simply doesn't work, if there are any alternatives that would allow me to play without wanting to gouge my eyes out I'd appreciate it if someone would let me know, it'd be a big help.

Thanks

replies.body:
1. Sell the Mac.
2. Buy a high-end Desktop, and/or high-end Laptop, with enough money left over to buy the car of your dreams.
3. ???
4. Profit!!!

No, but seriously, I have no idea. Never bothered with Apple products.

Try asking people on your side of the world.
That would be a start.
